idea:
FlypTheBill is an advertisement startup that aims to serve local medium to large scale companies who want to advertise in their local area. These companies are facing huge competition with e-commerce ventures and the current advertisement methods for these companies are not affordable and efficient. FlyptheBill aims to streamlines this experience for an inexpensive advertisement model.

Advertising is the worlds largest and most profitable sector. Most of the companies generate their revenue from advertisements. At FlypTheBill we have created a unique platform where local vendors can advertise their business in their local area and can give a glimpse of their shops existence to the customers who live near the shop.

we all know that Pamphlets, Newspaper Ads, Hoardings etc are all traditional way of advertising. FlypTheBill brings a revolutionary change in the advertising sector.
name: Deval Shah

idea: Pantree Hospitality And Services Pvt. Ltd. manufactures and distributes Bakery and Confectionery products under the brand ‘The Bake Shop’. We specialize in wide range of Bakery products, savory snacks, Breads and Eggless 100% Veg Cakes. All our products are prepared in a modern, semi-automatic factory where we adhere to stringent guidelines of hygiene and cleanliness, ensuring a safe and healthy food preparation for all our patrons. We operate in both B2C and B2B markets in Mumbai city and surrounding. please visit us at www.thebakeshop.in
name: Pantree Hospitality

idea:
IOT enabled containers that can track the quantity of essential products and place order automatically. 

There are two designs that we have developed:

Design 1: Easy to use pads to track and order fast replenishable products. It is designed for products that are supplied in containers, which can be placed on the pads.

Design 2: Containers that can track quantity of indegrients, suits a majority kitchen items those have to be stored in containers.


How the product works and help in COVID 19 issue:

Smart containers have load sensors that track the quantity and time to time communicate it to data cloud. Basis current quantity, orders can be placed. 


Amid lockdown most households are dependent on online orders. The smart containers will help in automatically tracking quantity and restocking. 


The continuous tracking of quantity will also help retailers to stock accordingly which is a common issue during the lockdown.
name: Arpit Saxena
